title: The Care behind the smile
creator_credit: Film Australia, Australia. Dept. of Health, Housing and Community Services, Suzanne Baker and Debby Kingsland
brief_description: Dental therapists are badly needed in schools to ensure bad tooth decay does not develop amongst children. The film tells of the Australia-wide dental therapist training scheme, which will provide dental therapists for schools.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Australia. Dept. of Health, Housing and Community Services, Suzanne Baker and Debby Kingsland
description: Dental therapists are badly needed in schools to ensure bad tooth decay does not develop amongst children. The film tells of the Australia-wide dental therapist training scheme, which will provide dental therapists for schools.
